content: pineapple and pinwheel doily #627 by coats & clark s ont 1956 paperback two page leaflet illustration and directions from a coats & clark free leaflet gauge not given doily measures approximately 14-1/2 inches in diameter **materials ** size 30 crochet thread original calls for 2 balls of either j & p coats big ball best six cord mercerized crochet art a 104 or clark s big ball mercerized crochet art b 34 milwards steel crochet hook no 10 #pinwheel
